price: 26. Puis Je Me saisis des mécréants. Quelle ne fut alors Ma réprobation !
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
